LayoutShiftLastInputTime.summary: The lastInputTime read-only property of the interface returns the time of the most recent excluding input or 0 if no excluding input has occurred.

remarks.para: Layout shifts are only bad if the user wasn't expecting them. Many layout shift metrics (like Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS)) exclude shifts that occurred soon after certain user interactions. These interactions are called excluding inputs. Excluding inputs are:
The mousemove and pointermove events are not excluding inputs.

LayoutShiftLastInputTime.value: A indicating the most recent excluding input time or 0 if no excluding input has occurred.
